title: Body text (book's from 2006)
content:
I'm trying to identify this font, but have not been successful so far. I've tried Identifont, WhatTheFont and WhatFontIs, but none could identify it. Can anyone name this font?

Many thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114533im_/http:/typophile.com/files/UnkownFont_5253.jpg)

Font: 

 Requiem Text HTF (Roman) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114533/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: UncleType

comments.content: It must be **[Requiem Text HTF (Roman)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114533/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones&ffam=Requiem%20Text-HTF-%20-%20Roman&fid=1e8e739aeb801fc18f6e21aeae58a278&fsize=60&text=WYGRTheafypngbrdj%3F&wrap=2)** by Hoefler+Frere Jones
